page.title: 07Westbury School
page.content:
Westbury-on-Severn C of E Primary School, to give it its correct title, is part aided by the Church of England. It caters for children up the the age of 11. There are 3 classes - Infants, Top Infants/1st and 2nd year, Juniors and 3rd/4th year Juniors. There are 2 full time teachers and a teaching Headmistress, also a part- time teacher, part-time Welfare Assistant and part-time Secretary.
During 1985 there are approximately 70 pupils receiving full-time education.
The school runs a football team, netball team and swimming team. The older children are also encouraged to take part in the cycling proficiency examination. These activities could not take place without the assistance of parents and the local policeman.
